name: The Mossport Story
description: Welcome to Mossport, Texas! You play as Derek Jackson, long-time resident of Mossport and family man. After discovering a brochure in his mailbox for a new plastic manufacturing plant being built, Derek has to decide his next course of action. Does he rise up and take action against this new plastic plant being built or does he just sit idly by and watch the plant ruin his hometown?
